name: Ugly Girl
review: I'm mostly satisfied with this product. It really is matte, like it states. I'm middle-aged so matte lipsticks don't look as good on my lips. I need a little glossiness, so need to apply a clear gloss over this lip product in order to avoid aging my looks even more. It doesn't feel, dry but it looks it a little. I like the color I chose, Elusive. It lasts for a while, but of course eating a drinking removes it, so then it needs to be reapplied.

name: AuntBee
review: This product looks great with light or heavy application. I've tried other colors in this line, but this is my favorite color. I have never liked dark lippies on myself, but this one looks amazing!

name: Karen
review: Love this lipstick!

name: Charlie
review: I was looking for the perfect berry shade and this did not disappoint. Great color and lasted all day with minimal touch ups. I cannot wait to try other shades.

name: Kiran
review: I like it

name: Leigh Anne
review: Compared to another lip crayon I've used, Revlon is much better. This went on smooth and had a minty (that's the only way I can describe it) scent instead of a nauseating wax smell of other brands. Only drawback is this color, ELUSIVE, is a lot brighter once it is put on than it looks in the tube. Not so bad that it is unwearable but go a little softer handed. This is the only color I have tried so far in their crayon/balm line but I will be trying more.

name: Edie
review: Have tried many lip sticks and this is my go-to, faithful lip color.

name: ShoesOff
review: I love this lipstick.  I know they call it balm but I it isn't.  It goes on so smooth and looks amazing.  It has a matte finish which I love and the smell is very pleasant.

name: Linds
review: I have an extensive lip stick collection, BUT THIS LIPSTICK is the one that I cannot stop reaching for!!! The color Sultry is absolutely gorgeous! I normally hate matte lipsticks as they leave my lips feeling both sticky and dry, but this lipstick almost feels like a moisturizer! It is truly my ride or die lipstick and I will keep repurchasing again and again.

name: Alexa Leigh
review: I returned this item, the color did not fully cover lips for longer than 20 minutes, the color also changed with drying to a webbed- almost transparent color. Showing through to your lip under the color, which I'd prefer my lips to look clean & evenly applicators.

name: candyec
review: I love to use this as a great pop of color and the color options are beautiful

name: Valerie
review: I bought this product in "sultry." The color is as expected - great for fall lips! It is long lasting and goes on creamy. The shape makes application really easy as well. No complaints.

name: Laura
review:
I love the color, I have gotten complimented on my lipstick every time I have worn it
I wear it matte, or with a lipgloss over top.
I got it it 225 sultry

name: Autumn Jynx
review: I have the colors "Sultry" and "Elusive". I love them! They do need time to dry before drinking/eating, or the color will start wearing. I've found that after they dry down, they stick to your lips better. Being very matte, they can start to feel slightly drying after a couple hours. Also, they smell very minty and feel like a minty lip balm when applied; some people will like it, but some won't. I like it, though!

name: ClassyChic
review: I thought the consistency of this product was awful. It was true to color but was chalky and looked cheap on my lips- I'd go with another gloss or lipstick that isn't a crayon.

name: makeupbymoira
review: Oh my gosh! This line of products is amazing! I have the three or four shades and I love all of them! They last for hours and hours at a time! I can drink and eat and not worry about it coming off!! So much better than the high end lipsticks I have that have 30 minutes staying power and cannot last through anything!!

name: Pearl
review: I highly recommend it, since the first time I used it it made my lips look matte an they felt soft plus I love the minty feeling it gives your lips which is great in the winter time to prevent cold sores.

name: lipstickobsesser
review: standout is the perrrrfect red! i'd heard many thought so too so when i bought it, my hopes were not high because people are never really right, but !!!!! on point ♥

name: Pri
review: The color is rich but go away easily

name: Elisabeth the awesome
review: I used it over a Chapstick and under a gloss.

name: Ana
review: I love the texture, it's matte but glides on easily. This is my second tube I buy this year. The color looks good on me.

name: Mandy
review: I don't  usually  wear anything  on my lips except chapstick, but I was going to a party and decided I needed a little  color. This product did exactly that. I loved it and felt great wearing it.

name: Make-up Obsessed
review: It lasted most of the day and didn't leave my lips feeling dry like other matte lipsticks. This is definitely one of my new favorites!

name: Abs
review: After I put it on my lips, it feels smoothly and hydrated.

name: mariemovies
review: It felt great when I first applied it. It went on smoothly and evenly. It did not come off while drinking or eating. It did make my lips feel and look dry about 1 hour in. In about 2.5 hours it was gone.

name: Kathy
review: No comment

name: Ana
review: I wish color was better more tru

name: Liz
review: Ok. I'm OBSESSED with this product. It isn't drying AT ALL despite being a matte balm. It smells faintly of peppermint, and it's super easy to apply. There's great range of colors for all different occasions! I wear this stuff on a daily basis. It's not the kind of matte that lasts forever, but when it wears down it looks like a stain. Since it's so easy to apply and carry with you, it's super simple to touch up! I can't recommend this enough!

name: Cate
review: Gets a little clumpy after multiple applications... If I want to reapply I usually wipe the first layer off. That doesn't bother me, but I would just warn people not to expect it to last all day. Also, the container looks brown but the color is more of a deeper autumn-ish red (which is what I was going for).

name: n/a
review: Great for day or night.

name: ms.mk
review: Good pigmentation, but is chalky and patchy so it works best after you smooth it out with your fingertip. Long lasting.

name: Running from old age
review: If you are looking for a lip product with BRIGHT colors, this is it.  Too bright for me.

name: kat
review: tastes minty nice creamy but i picked one color ,complex that made me look dead looked like i put foundation on my lips.I just have to pick a better color

name: BetseyJ
review:
The smell is not pleasant. The fat pencil is awkward to hold.
Too drying.

name: zariia
review: Love it!!! The color pops!!  *& very noticeable! Also feels very soothing on the lips

name: Beth the Lipstick Queen
review: Not used to the minty flavor which kind of puckers your lips but love the look.  I like the matte finish and also is great with some gloss on top to change it a bit.

name: Barbie
review: I love make-up! So here is the real deal..... Shameless #215 is the closest dupe for Her*** since I can't say the name because it's screening the words... smh from MAC. Now the hue is slightly different with this being more of a blue based and MAC more of pink base. The color is so simiiar once applied its hard to tell the difference. The color is buildable and great for ombre lips! Def a must have!!!!! Go get one today, you won't regret it! :) Oh and it's matte but applies so smoothly you don't need to prime your lips.

name: Houston
review:
I love the Revlon matte balms they are highly pigmented and last a long time. They are better or as good as some of the high end matte lipsticks. The bast I have tried so far,I have tried many high end brands.
If you feel it a little too dry for your lips-- as all matte lipsticks are-- use a chap stick or a moisture lip balm first and then apply the Revlon matte Balm

name: ms.mk
review: I have this in a few colors. The colors are bright and opaque, and they're long lasting. However, they're chalky and cakey, and can be patchy in just one coat because of it. I have to pat them down with a tissue to get them to look even and smooth, but that's no big deal. I found them to be pretty matte--almost powdery and unreflective, and that powdery texture on the lips is why I give it three stars instead of four. I like that they're rich and solid enough that I don't need liner to make clean lines as well. Overall, they're okay.

name: Trish
review: I like this lip balm.  I can't remember if it contains SPF, so I can't comment if it heals lips or has sun protection. It does go on very smooth and doesn't cake.  It does seem to be a little drying if not used with a lip primer or gloss.  The color is fun and I would continue to use this product.

name: CB
review: Useful for multiple areas

name: Angel
review: I love the color I just wished it lasted longer.

name: charliecat
review: My friend bought a couple of these for me a couple of Christmases ago because she swears by them. I am also a big fan now, so I bought this shade last week. It is a gorgeous color, true to the tube. It lasts really long, doesn't dry out my lips to much, and even passed the kiss the boyfriend test more than once. A+

name: Dazy
review: I use this as a colored lip product.

name: Jeanna
review: Love this matte lip color! Perfect daily shade, long lasting, easy to apply.

name: Sammyboo34
review: I love the color its perfect for summer & spring! It doesn't last long though and my lips got really dry while wearing this product.

name: forge
review: I love these.  They are an amazing matte color and are so easy to apply.

name: Jenn
review: This was not good. It was dry and chalky. And it was way pinker than it appeared. My lips felt dry for days afterward.

name: G
review: I love this lipstick. I specifically use #250 and #205. I love that it lasts most of the day! Enjoy!

name: lulu
review:
There are so many new matte colors out from different brands, but this is the sure way to go if you don't want to spend a lot but want good quality !
great matte finish without drying, it does slightly bleed but it is something i can get over. I purchased the color "Fierce" perfect brown/berry color

name: Shay
review: I thought I wouldn't like it because it said it was matte, but took a chance. I got every color. My favorite is shameless. They all have some moisture to them. Not your retro type of matte. I think it's better.

name: allie
review: this is a good product but the color mischievous is horrible it sinks into all the lines in my lips and accentuates all the dry patches. I don't recommend this color.

name: mickey
review: Goes on smoothly,very moisturizing,great price.

name: legallyheidi
review: I have Elusive, and I plan on purchasing more. I am not a big fan of tinted lip balms, as they tend to fade quickly, or cake up. This is awesome, because it leaves a stain on the lips when it fades, however the stain isn't "dry" feeling as other stains. I also got a bit of a minty tingle from it.

name: Laila
review: I have two of these and I have to say that they're just as nice as my matte lipsticks from MAC. In fact, they're more moisturizing than my MAC lipsticks. They come off if you eat something of course, but that happens with any non-long wear lip product. The only con I can think of for these would be that the color range isn't wider! I absolutely love the two colors I have, though.

name: Brittanyy
review: I use this product pretty lightly, sometimes with a balm under (personal obsession with lipbalms) because its extremely pigmented for my taste. I purchased in the shade Elusive and its a very pink, but not terribly bright. I think this can be worn on a day to day basis. Stays matte but i did not find it drying at all. Really creamy and easy to apply.

name: Jade, a fellow makeupaholic
review: Growing up I have started to turn away from lip glosses because my hair gets stuck in it and I find it unflattering. Shiny, sparkly isn't my desired look anymore. These balms are highly pigmented, beautifully matte, slightly minty and they last pretty much all day when I use my Nyx lip primer underneath. I plan on buying the whole collection. Though I don't know when I'll wear purple, it's still a beautiful shade!

name: Lady Margaery
review: This matte lipstain is AMAZING. I AM ADDICTED. The color is creamy, long lasting, and not drying at all! Sultry is my personal favorite for my olive skin tone. If you're on the fence, go buy one, I promise you will not be disappointed!!!!!!

name: kittykat
review: I love using this daily when i have no make up or am in a rush quick and easy to apply and can be stored in my purse.

name: LoLo
review: These surprised me because matte products always worry me that will be too drying but these are not drying at all. They are not moisturizing either but love the colors and are super pigmented. Plus can always top with gloss if want glossy look.

name: MarissaGroovy
review: I really love my revlon matte lip balms. Revlon has impressed me with this one- I had an idea they would be really translucent like most tinted lip balms (im more of a lipstick gal) but I was wrong! The color is intense and the pigmentation is pretty bright. It's nice having the color of lipstick and the comfort of a lip balm. I would buy them all if they came out with more colors!

name: MaggieD143
review: Love these Matte Balms. Got the color Standout and it's a gorgeous every day red. Highly Recommended.

name: MNrnmommy
review: I am a very fair skinned brunette. I purchased Standout, which is a matte red.  It applies smoothly, and I like the control of color placement that this style of lip product provides. I have more of a cool undertone, and this shade worked for me. It was mint scented though, which I don't like. Now that I am in my mid thirties, I am finding I don't like matte finished lipsticks as much. However, if the fragrance doesn't bother you, and you looking for a matte lipstick to try, this may be a good one for you.   Ultimately, I returned it.

name: Kat
review: Great product for color but chapped my lips a little bit

name: lauraH
review: Made my lips look a billion years older as the formula empathized the lines on my lips.

name: Woody
review: Such cool colors! I love this stuff!

name: Tee
review: I love the matte and lacquer balms they have a minty smell, and I love it. They are easily to apply the only thing I don't like is they don't last long, but other than that I wear them all the time.

name: Arrow
review: I love this product, I just didn't have enough colors to properly review and try this product. I hope they come out with more colors as well as more product so I can get my hands on them and review. The color I have goes on great and last, personly I prefer lip stains to lip balms but this changed my mind about balms. I can't wait for more product.

name: Rowze
review: Bought this product to try out because I saw it on display, ended up returning it because I didn't like how it dried out my lips...

name: sravyam
review: It is perfect. Love love love to this amazing product!

name: sandy the redhead
review:
Man, I bought this on sale and I'm IN LOVE. my lips are frequently dry and lipsticks (especially the drug store brands) really clump up for me, but I can't really afford high end cosmetics. This does NOT dry out my lips, its like a beauty miracle! I love the minty smell and velvety feel... And the colors are stunning. I'm a redhead who looks best in warm lipsticks and a number of these look great with my skin tone. I'm so happy that I just bought another one (not on sale), tried it on, and haven't left the store parking lot yet! Just had to let everyone know about it!

And to other redheads who may be looking for warm colors that match your hair, I bought Striking and Elusive. Love them both!

:)

name: Kelsea
review: I bought this as a dupe for my Clinique Chubby Sticks, which I still prefer. I bought 'elusive' and is not the best color for my fair skin. Should not be applied on chapped/dry lips, but good color pigmentation.

name: Desertdeb
review: Great color retention.  Lips stay hydrated.  Not too matte or too shiny- just right.

name: Bea
review: it's very good for party makeup.

name: Busy Student
review: I expected more from Revlon after their lip butter,lipsticks, and lip stains. Gives you a really pretty matte lip. Pretty good product with great color but the quality just wasn't there. DO NOT buy this in place of lipbalm it doesn't really moisturize or anything like that.

name: PrincessLc
review: purchased this for fall and it is my favorite color for this season!

name: Angelkiwi350
review: I love the lasting power, pigmentation, and minty flavor.

name: Jenn
review: This is my favorite raspberry color that is beautifully matte and velvety.  My favorite color in the original Revlon Lip balms is Honey and this Sultry color is a matte version but better!

name: Mariee
review: this is perfect ! Color , balm , matte and long stay! LOVE IT !

name: LoneStarRise
review: I've been using the pencils, but am new to matte. Looked much nicer, more expensive. Love the long lasting yet nondrying aspect.Will buy again and again.

name: K
review: Excellent

name: Jenna
review: I loved the color, it feels moisturizing at first but then dries out your lips. It might just be my extremely chapped peeling lips but that is what happened for me

name: Nikki
review: I love this product. True to it color.

name: Dori
review: Ok but not color I was expecting.

name: Xochbro
review: Long lasting. Keeps lips soft all day long

name: Hayley P.
review: I have several lip stains that are a bit too dramatic for every day use and I wanted a lip product for the daytime to wear to work. This product is perfect for that! It doesn't go on very heavy and the Sultry color is a classic red/pink and suites my olive skin tone well. It's hydrating and lasts awhile - especially for a balm. If you're looking for a stain, this is not the right product, it will wear off after eating and drinking but it's great if you don't mind reapplying a couple of times throughout the day.

name: Dee Dee
review: I am happy with color and application.  Color pops, great for all seasons because of blue base.  I apply clear gloss over.

name: AGD
review: Was underwelmed with this. Easily smudged and needs to be reapplied constantly.

name: Katlynn
review: Love it

name: Fatima
review: Yessss

name: DRandall
review: I only had to touch up once after lunch, held all day without the cakey/flakey that you get from other all day lipsticks.

name: Nikki
review: This product worked very well. Great Color. Minty feel.

name: saima
review: I love this product and good thing is I don't need sharpener for this.

name: Beauty Obsessed
review: Went on streaky. Color different from the tube. Will not buy again.

name: PaulaMarie
review: I bought this on a whim... I have been looking for something matte but not the matte lipstick that feels dry. When I saw Matte Balm I was intrigued.  There was a great color selection and I went bright for spring/summer.  This balm stays on and stays put!!!  It also stays creamy all day. I recommend this to everyone I see.

name: Mad about lipsticks
review: This product is amazing...so comfortable on lips..totally matte but not drying...nice smell...great color payoff.I have only two but definitely buy some more.. :)

name: win.d.sir.c
review: I love this stuff and have recommended it to several friends who have purchased it and love it just as much as I do!

name: xxamxx
review: I have no complaints with the product, it is a great lip color product, but the color selection is not so good.

name: LikeWTFBro
review: This color is true to itself. What I love about it, is that it actually last longer than the big brand lipstick. It's really purple and it is BEAUTIFUL! It does not come off easily!

name: Becky
review: Lasting color.  Do not have to keep applying during te day.

name: miki
review: i bought this on a whim was looking for a new lipstick it ok has a nice minty smell but does not stay on long very dull in color and you do have to reapply for  a name brand product i thought it would be better

name: miki
review: i wanted to try a new brand and type of lipstick so  i went to ultra to look and bought this  not bad mixed it with other colors

name: April
review: Love it!

name: None
review: I loved the product..

name: Shay
review: Must apply gloss or moisturizer BEFORE applying!! And goes on smooth once you have a lip primer or something on first

name: Meme
review:
Guys... this product is the bomb! I cannot express enough how much I love this lip color.
When I first tried it I was a little afraid it wouldn't look good, but the blue hues in it really work on a pink skin tone and make your teeth look whiter.

name: Cassie
review: I want more colors of this lip balm! I use with a clear gloss!

name: Larabrite
review: This balm comes out so matt, without feeling drying. It smells lovely and minty and is very deeply pigmented.

name: JB
review: Would NOT recommend !

name: Socalmtngirl
review: I was looking for a sheer red that wasn't overpowering and that is exactly what I got from this product. Very pleased.

name: Diva
review: i have the shades sultry, unapologetic and shewy.it is very pigmented, lasts long and smells so good.only one thing is i do not like is it is too matte and hence tends to show imperfections on the lips.

name: Kdm_Courtney
review: Very pigmented, smooth, little transfer after applying

name: auro
review: I love the color my favorite thing about this product is that it feels fresh in my lips when it's drying up. it's soft on my lips. Has a creamy texture

name: Lover of great smells
review:
use it a couple of times a week
goes on very easily

name: Walking Wham
review: This is the first time I have used it, but I like it so far.

name: Maddy
review: THIS PRODUCT IS AMAZING!  I got a color that's a little darker than my natural lip color and I'm in love!!! I usually shear it out because it's a little too dramatic for an 8th grader, but when sheared out it is so beautiful!

name: SimplySassy
review: Love the color and feel of this matte.

name: Lala
review: It smells great and soothes your lips but I don't like the color which I guess is ok cause it wears off pretty quick.

name: Muffy
review: Love it!

name: Talia
review: When I swatch the color Unapologetic[210] on my wrist, it comes out even-pigmented, but for some reason when I apply it to my lips, it appears patchy and almost chalky. On the plus side, it is matte but not drying, which is a pleasant surprise. As a side-note, Unapologetic[210] appears pinkish online, but is more of a shocking coral in actuality, almost orangey.

name: kla
review: Grat moisture

name: Elizabet
review: I like it but it's not really good for me. Maybe it's the colour but not for me.

name: Dark Angel
review: I love the long lasting colors.

name: Reemz
review: The less you speak, the longer this color stays on.

name: Vivvy
review: It goes on smoothly.  It does not smudge or bleed.  It also feels good on the lips and the color was just beautiful.  I plan on getting more colors.

name: M
review: Pretty color for pop on lips.  I apply a layer of shiny balm on top.  The color alone would be a little too matte for my liking.  Maybe just a little too chunky.  But I am happy with this purchase.

name: Lekkijp
review: I recently purchased Audacious after originally purchasing Mischievous. Mischievous would wash me out. It was too light for my skin tone but it went on nicely. Audacious goes perfectly with my skin tone but it settles into every line you have on your lips. Exfoliating is a must before applying this balm. It isn't long lasting. You need to reapply after eating/drinking. These two colors don't stain your lips but leave orange outlines and patches on your lips after eating/drinking. I wish the formula was better in these two colors was better. I did not try any of the other ones yet but will most likely do so in the future.

name: Hometown Heroine
review: As a blogger I had been searching for the perfect Matte Neon lipstick for summer to share with my readers. Every time I went into Ulta 'Shewy' was sold out so I didn't get to swatch it for quite sometime. The second I was able to swatch it I was 100% sold! Shewy is a blue based pink so it almost has that Lilac color that is so on trend for summer plus you totally can't beat the price! With how much pigment the product posses you get so much product and color for your money! Its amazing, go buy it!

name: Fashionably Organized
review: I loved the concept of this product and for a matte it felt great on my lips. I'm fair with red undertones and bought Complex.. I'm usually spot on in my lip colors, but no matter what I do I can't make this color work for me. I will be buying more of this in a color that works though. Swatch the colors if you can.

name: GiGi
review: I bought this in Shewy and I love the pinkness of it! It will last a long time, but after eating I recommend reapplication. It is smooth at the beginning of the application, but it never fully dries out, it just becomes less smooth.

name: lyss
review: I love this product! I got it in SULTRY and the pigmentation is amazing and it feels amazing on my lips! It is so comfortable to wear and doesn't feet tight like other matte lip products. As you wear these for a couple hours they leave a nice stain afterwards, no complaints from me.  For under 10 dollars, I will definitely buy more shades! I hope this isn't a limited edition collection because these are great to say the least. Great job revlon!!

name: Brittany
review: I personally love this lip matte balm, I don't notice or care about drying. They don't feel drying to me. I love the pigmentation.. It's gorgeous! I have MISCHEVIOUS (light peachy cream) , stormy ( bright blue based pink w lavendar undertone) , and Unapologetic ( bright coral pink) .. I have a light complexion, and all these colors look amazing on me. I have dark hair, light skintone .. Think mac nc30 . They last forever, I went to sleep for couple hours and woke up to no smearing and it looked like I had just applied it! I love the clean mint scent just like Tartes.

name: TxRN
review:
I bought this in.....the color #205. It's a pinky/ rose color. On my lips the color is very pigmented, I have to rub it in my lips for a wash of color and then I apply a gloss over the top b/c it can be drying (yes, I know it's matte).

Perhaps a different color would be better but I don't feel I'd purchase another. I do prefer the Jordana Twist and Shine or the Covergirl lip perfection gloss balms.

name: Mrs. Foster
review: I like to put this product on and use my fingers to pat it dry. It dries so beautifully like a matte stain. If you don't pat it in the product creases and the color is uneven and you look crazy! Tip** Use a lip liner, the color won't run.

name: kjo11
review: The color is so pretty and it stays on for a long time!

name: ccr00
review: So long lasting and opaque. Love the way it looks on my lips. Totally get it!

name: Lauren
review: These lipsticks are amazing, bottom line. They are true to color, long lasting, and smell kind of minty. HOWEVER they are matte, so they can be very drying. I would not recommend this to someone with dry or chapped lips. Sometimes they can feather so it's very important to LINE YOUR LIPS FIRST! Overall it's a great product, as long as you have basic product and application knowledge.

name: Karlyann
review: This lipstick is very vibrant. I have purchased it in several colors.

name: MEG
review: Long lasting and keeps your lips moist. Love love love.

name: ukrane369
review: I ordered this in Striking and I am very surprised with the color. It is not red like I expected, but a very subtle red which makes it very natural when applied on the lips. Aside from that, it has a very minty scent and cooling sensation which I actually like. The application applied evenly and smoothly. It is very matte indeed. The pigment is between light to medium coverage. So for those who wants a very pigmented red lip color, this is not for you.

name: Chelseyaniece@aol.com
review: I love the color. It's my go to!

name: missmichalalynn
review: These are great and fun to wear but they're not super long wearing

name: Vee
review:
For the perfect bold matte lip. Goes on smooth. Has light peppermit smell. Great color.
Remember to exfoliate/ apply lip balm to lips before applying. Can make dry lips look worse. But my favorite matte lipstick.

name: Elle
review: Great color. Dosent dry my lips. Long lasting. Will be purchasing again.

name: Kathy
review: Creamy

name: naw
review: its easy to put on   much better than bare minerals lipstick i bought

name: Patti
review: Used for almost 2 years. Has replaced almost every other lip product. Color lasts so long i sometimes don't reapply again all day

name: susan
review: Easy crayon color with a matte finish

name: Blake (makeup lover)
review: Love, Love, Love!!!!

name: Naomi
review: This is NOT good. I returned it. I don't remember which color I got but it ended up looking neon pink on my skin even though it looked like a sort of soft, muted berry color from the tube. It was really bad and exaggerated all the texture on my lips (even though they were moisturized well and not chapped). I thought that I would like this since I LOVE Revlon's balm stains but this was just terrible. Skip it and go for something else to get the trendy matte finish.

name: Jess
review: I really love this product - lasts through a lot. Drinking beverages, smoking (I know I know, but it does stay on!), only wore off after a few hours, and that was because of eating. Reapplied after eating (5pm ish) and stayed on well into the night. I just wish there were more colors available.

name: Mich
review: I was truly disappointed when I wore the product but the color was a lot lighter than the container.. I don't think I'll be wearing it again :(

name: Nina
review: Love the matte look and price

name: Beauty
review: Creamy long lasting

name: C Lo
review:
With age I do not like to wear a lot of make up.
This product is light, moisturizes, and lasts long.

name: Gabriella
review: Although it does not last after eating, it is not hard to put back on. I really love the color (I bought "Sultry"). It is perfect for a casual day or a fancy event. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

name: Jenn
review: Okay, so I'm not opposed to other brands, but this is hands down my favorite matte.  Full disclosure: I've only tried the darker colors.  The lighter colors may be different.  But Shameless held up through talking, singing, drinking, and eating.  The gloss I was wearing wore off, and the color from this faded, but it faded evenly and beautifully, and not all that much.  Plus it feels like velvet.  It's non-drying, at least for me (and I have a problem with dry lips).  It goes on very smoothly and takes a few minutes to set.  Prior to setting I've found that it can be blended.  I like to use a lip brush around the outline of my mouth to neaten everything up.

name: lavender2288
review:
I have fair skin and sultry is such a beautiful berry color that compliments it. I can wear it in the day or evening. I can wear it year round but it looks especially great in the fall and winter time.

The downside is that it wears off fast. I went to Ulta in search of a similar color but that lasts longer. I spent over an hour trying to find the most similar color and finally found a similar one. It's Calvin Klein's one lipstick in color 230 entice. Almost identical in color and feel/way it goes on but a little higher quality and lasts longer. Just an FYI.

name: Chelsea
review: I love this stuff! I bought it in two colors and they are both great. The lighter one doesn't have perfect color pay off, but it's something you have to be really looking for, which I'm sure no one else is. These stay on really well and they don't dry out my lips! This is the least drying of any matte lip product I have tried thus far. I wish there was a wider color selection, but I love the ones I have and will probably get one or two more.

name: Ivy
review: I had kinda high expectations for this product because I've seen a TON of beauty gurus recommend it. I was NOT a fan of this product. I take classes at my local cc and the class is only 3 hours. I'll go to class with the balm on and by the end of class the color has completely worn off. Also the product makes my lips really chapped, which totally opposes the whole point the product uses to try to get sales.

name: make up lover
review: every colorburst i own i love i have 8 of them and they never disappoint.

name: Veggiegirl
review: Use this almost daily. I never though I would be someone to pick one color and stick with it. Great matte color, sultry. Great for someone that doesnt like that sticky lip feel. I have no compalints.

name: PancakePonies
review: Great! More of a color than a balm. Love the minty taste and smell!

name: ISSY
review: Great color coverage.

name: VikingFlyer
review: I love this product more than my $42 foundation! I have sultry, standout, and unapologetic. Standout is my favorite because it's a very vivid color with zero shine. Sultry is better for casual days and I don't wear unapologetic too often because it clashes with my skin tone making it look orange. Last a good amount of the day if you're eating and drinking regularly, I don't eat till I'm home so it last all day for me. Great buy!

name: Budget Beauty
review: These are great for any lip junkies. I have shameless and sultry and they are beautiful colors that are very opaque and easy to build up. They have a great minty smell, and even though they're matte, they're not drying at all. I have 0 complaints about these as they are nearly perfect and I plan to buy more.

name: BellaAngella
review: I bought this in the color "shameless", it is a beautiful deep vibrant purple. It is soft, creamy, and smooth. It dries to a satin/matte finish. I fell head over heals in love. It is such a wonderful, versatile color that is wearable in any season (perhaps that's just my complexion). COMPLETELY GORGEOUS!

name: NicB
review: I really wanted to try some new lip options. This is portable, not too expensive and has a nice look to it. It goes on smooth and lasts for a long time. I have very dry lips and this doesn't make them worse. I even layer it with the stain balm for a different look. It's fun to play with and easy to use for beginners as well.

name: Jane
review: I've been searching high and low for low-budget lip sticks and lip stains that are "kiss proof!" finally got around to trying Revlon's ColorBurst Matte Balm & I loved the color immediately! I got it in "Standout" and again my medium/dark skin, its a nice not too bright/not too dark shade of red. I did however figure out that if you want it "kiss proof" only apply a thin layer (outlining the lip and blotting the inside of lips). it never transferred to anything i was drinking out of and lasted though my dinner (i ate a sandwich). Im contemplating buy more in different shades, but their color selection is limited.

name: galgotspirit
review: Dring and color way too bright; neon almost! Also, pencil is not retractable as the description says. It's a chubby crayon/pencil.

name: shopper
review: I bought the stunning and the shameless colors, I love them both. Stunning is a good red-orangey color on me, and since it's matte, I can wear it with almost anything. Shameless is dark purple. Both are long lasting and I love the matte look, they are moisturizing but I would need something stronger to treat chapped lips or cold sores.

name: Flower
review: Love this lip color. It really flatters and it lasts. I mean ALL. DAY. LONG. I apply in the am and still look great when I leave work. Down side, I feel like it drys out my lips so it's a lot of chapstick use in the evenings. But I still love it.

name: Katarina
review: I love the color this lip balm gives.  I do use a little vaseline or aquaphor under it just to make it last but to also smooth out teh color over my lips.  Without it the color is a little much and looks a tad cakey on lips.  That being said it's the perfect lip color when mixed with a little Vaseline.

name: Libbi
review:
I LOVE THIS PRODUCT! I have "Standout" and "Sultry" and love them!

Standout is such a deep, rich red! It goes on easily, lasts, and looks so elegant. "Sultry" is a great fall/winter pink and is such a rich, creamy color!

I love these because they are creamy and rich and don't look dry when you apply like some matte lipsticks. This also has a minty tingle that feels great on my lips.

I find that matte lipsticks in general can show imperfections in the lips. If you have dry lips take a wash cloth and some Vaseline. Rub a generous amount of Vaseline on your lips and use the cloth to rub the lips. Do this until your lips are silky smooth!

name: Big K
review: I wanted to give this matte balm a try. I was very pleased with the results. Nice variety of colors to choose from. Fairly long lasting. The only downside of using it, is it can dry out your lips, so put a gloss over the top of it and you should be good! ;) Would definitely buy it again!

name: Dora
review: The Revlon Colorburst Matte Balm is a brilliant red. It's a "true" red -- not brick, not orange, but a real red with blue undertones. You can wear it full-on for a dramatic look, or blot to more of a stain and pair with a lip balm. It's truly a fantastic color. Great for fall/winter. Happy to have it back in rotation. Application is not super easy -- you need a mirror and possibly a tissue at the ready -- but it's worth the bother and is budget friendly, too.

name: MonFu
review: When I bought it, it appeared that I would be able to sharpen it using a wide pencil/crayon sharpener, but that is not the case. The only actual product you get is what's visible at the top of the crayon - not worth the cost at all.

name: Kaylee
review: These balms are great for everyday. They wear well and have great pigmentation.

name: Drea
review: The color pay off of Sultry is great! It is a pretty bold color, but great for fall! This balm is not sold as a stain, but it has such great pigmentation that it is long lasting and almost stains the lips.  I really like the deep color of sultry and think its a great night look color, when I wear it during the day, I blend it with honey in the Just Bitten line.  The matte effect of the balm does not dry out lips but stays even and does not have any shine, it is a true matte color.  I will definitely be trying more shades in this line.

name: Rupster
review: I absolutely love this lip crayon! Usually lipsticks do NOT last on me, and I have to keep reapplying, this one lasted all morning, and only came off when I was eating. It's a great color for my (brown) skin tone.

name: Lipstick Hater
review: Love this product! Want them all!

name: Budget beauty
review: I purchased this balm in "shameless" because I thought it would be a good match for my caramel skin tone. Love it!!! Great coverage and smooth texture without dying. lasts for hours without touch ups.

name: c
review: Although the product smelled amazing it looked horrible on my lips. Granted, my lips were a bit on the chapped side but this made my lips look and feel dryer. Not moisterizing in the slightest. The color was ok but not something I would recommend.

name: DaisyBelle
review: "Standout" is my perfect color for classic red lips. I've tried a ton of red lipsticks and they're always too bright and neon, or too harsh for my pale skin, or they make my teeth look yellow. This color is perfect though. The formula is ok; they can be a little bit drying but they're still better than most other matte lip products I've tried, and I actually like the crayon format better than a regular lipstick.

name: Anne
review:
So I bought Standout and Elusive. Both great, but Elusive was pretty patchy, which might just be the one I got because I'd read reviews saying that the only patchy one was Mischievous, but I didn't get that one so who knows. Anyway, Standout is the classic red, my go-to for everyday use, and Elusive is just a light, slightly mauve pink. Not sure how often I'll use that since it's so patchy.

It's really drying if you use a lipliner under it, but if you only line your lips it's less drying. With reapplication it is hydrating again.

My only complaint is that it gets used pretty quickly. You don't get a lot of product. When I bought it, I don't know why, but I assumed the whole tube had the balm in it, but it was only about an inch and a half's worth. I've only used it for two weeks and feel like a lot has been used, but maybe that's just me. Anyway, these are great, definitely would reccommend them, the cons aren't that big of a deal for me. Probably won't buy again, but it was worth my money.

name: Kristen
review: I am a huge fan of matte lipsticks.  I have a good collection of matte lipsticks and I couldnt resist buying one of these matte balms.  I love the texture- a great combination of moisture and mattifying that keeps in looking natural.  I bought in "Sultry" and looks great on my fair to light skin.

name: Gracie
review: This product feels like chap stick or lip balm. It goes on so smoothly and the color stays really well. I wore it for News Years. It was a huge hit!

name: Sammy
review: I was so happy to see this gorgeous shade of pink on my lips and at a low cost too, but I wasn't very happy when I was wiping the color off my teeth all day. I love this product and every shade, but the application is uneven and the staying power is definitely not worth it. I also don't see the product being matte on my lips, maybe it will work for someone else!

name: Briana
review: Love this for a matte lip, I did not notice any dryness(maybe my high tolerance). Or could just be my comparing it to poor quality products, I love it. It is matte! I got 6, and yes already recommended it. I use the revlon balm stains have 4, curious to get some lacquers maybe all, will get rest of mattes.      I have 215,205,245,235,210,240

name: Cindy
review: This is by far my favorite matte lip balm ever! I can't believe that I get so much pigment from a lip balm. And it's perfectly matte!

name: Nena Sweetie
review: LOVE LOVE LOVE these! The only drawback I could find is that almost all the ones in the store have obviously been opened & tried. Nothing that a dip in alcohol can't fix but super annoying.

name: Ray
review:
Love this product, the only issue I have with it is that it looks a little flaky on my lips but I do not know if it because I need to exfoliate my lips before use, I have not tried that yet.
I love that it is rich in color and looks natural. These were hidden by the register and this is the last of the nude color. The cashier told me that these are flying off the shelf because they are so popular.

name: Ellen
review: I love this matte lipstick!! It is so not drying like some high end brands! Lasts for a good amount of time but not after eating which is fine because that's not how it's marketed. Not a lot of the shades are that wearable for me because it's hard for me to pull off dramatic lips but if you're that type of girl you will go crazy!

name: msmeow85
review: I purchased this in the color "complex" (the nude brown color). It's an okay color, a bit too orangey brown on me, but I like that it isn't too dark or high maintenance like a red/dark lip can be. It smells good, feels good (minty) and I like the packaging. BUT it clings to all the dry patched on my lips. I exfoliate them often so I feel like it shouldn't be such a problem. I have only been able to use this product and make it look nice by combining it with another lipstick or a gloss. (Try NYX Butter Gloss in Creme Brulee--it tones down the orange and makes a near perfect nude). I may try the Kissable Balm Stain but I didn't care for how dry this made my lips. The Lipsurgence by Tarte are better!

name: Chloe
review: Very nice looking and feeling on the lips. I like to use a lip pencil with it and treat it like any other matte lipstick. The difference is the minty smell/feel and moisture. I will buy again.

name: Lilasiris
review: The shade range is unique for high end and drugstore products. No one else has a purple or bright orange like Revlon. When these first came out I was already overwhelmed with balm sticks from various brands, but I did buy one because I could't resist. I really love how pigmented these are and the finish makes even the brightest shades chic. These manage to be a soft matte, but those who suffer from dry lips will want a balm under it. I find them longer lasting than most balms, so it's a great product.

name: S
review: For the price of this product, it works so well.  Plus you barely need to put the lip color on; it's so pigmented, especially the reds. The only negative thing about it is it gets a little dry/flaky after a couple hours. I recommend using it with a lip liner or finishing it with chapstick.

name: Sam
review: This product is amazing! It is very creamy and has great color payoff. The only reason I did not rate it as perfect is because if you have small lips like mine, it can be a little tricky to apply. So a word of advice-take your time! I bought this product because it is almost an exact dupe for Candy Yum Yum. Definitely worth the money.

name: Lulu
review: This product does not stay on very long and is far less effective and more costly than at least two other products in the lip balm category (not permitted to mention those products by name) which perform far better and whose application looks much nicer, too.

name: Cubby
review: Very moisturizing and will stay on for awhile (about four hours) until one eats a meal.  Easy to apply.

name: JAY JAY
review: I really like this lip balm, smells minty, the color is a perfect red for me and lasts about a good 4 hrs before it starts to slightly wear off :-)

name: Dell
review: I love this product. It goes on great but needs to be touched up after an hour or two.

name: MakeUpAndDiamonds
review:
I really like the color Sultry. I have pretty pigmented lips, so I tend to go with something more around my lip color, like nudes or golden brown colors.

I got Sultry and it is a perfect match for my lips. I do use a lip spackle to prime them and then a baby lips dr rescue balm before putting the color on.

I do that because while they are creamy, the lip color can be drying. So moisturize your lips very well and use a lip primer before using this.

I think this is perfect for anybody and the color is just perfect. I high suggest the color Sultry.

name: ari
review: For color and price this is awesome. Love the colors and the finish.

name: SPM52
review: Color too light.

name: Katelyn
review: Awesome color and application. Wears off kind of easy if I am eating or drinking. I usually reapply once during a six hour shift at work and I am fine though.

name: E
review: I really like these lip pencils!  What I like most about them is that they feel creamy and smooth upon application.  They last a fair amount of time, too.

name: Jacky
review: Lipstick applies evenly on lips and allows the lips to be moisturized.

name: Raquel
review: Not a big lipstick wearer but after trying the deep red color and getting so many compliments at work I realized I should get into it. Except this doesn't feel like a lipstick at all. It feels thin, you forget you're even wearing it and it doesn't transfer as easily as a thick lipstick. I truly recommend if you're looking for a lipstick alternative that's easy to touch up and take with you. The drugstore price doesn't hurt either :)

name: Shoesoff22
review: I love this lip crayon.  It feels soft and smooth on my lips.  It has a great peppermint flavor and a nice matte finish.

name: AuntieNiNi
review: The products is very smooth and goes on evenly.

name: Summermon
review: I love these so much.  They have a slight minty scent and are not drying.  They are very opaque and last a good while for a lipstick.  I would buy more colors if they released them.  Unapologetic is very bright, almost neon.  Great formula and product.

name: acooper97
review: I bought the color Striking for my dance recital and the color is really great. It's very smooth to put on and it doesn't appear to be patchy.

name: Mommy C
review: Was looking for a natural looking lip stick and tried it on at night which looked great, but when I wore it in the day it was more of a brighter pink/red and didn't look that great on my skin color.

name: taytayh93
review: Love these but the color was not for me.

name: morgrow92
review: Long lasting and good color

name: Dyacky
review: I love how easy I can apply this balm. The color is not too bright pink but love how it blends to my everyday look.

name: missmango
review: Ah! I bought this in complex. It looked like I put paste on my lips. It didn't soak in at all. Looked incredibly unnatural. Very disappointed.

name: Kitty
review: This is a BEAUTIFUL color! I love the subtle matte finish and that the color stays on my lips for quite a while. It is not sticky or tacky feeling, which is wonderful. I would highly recommend this lip color to anyone wanting a fun pop of color that doesn't feel sticky on your lips and that lasts for a few hours without having to re-apply.

name: modernmartha
review:
Unapologetic is a vibrant, saturated, coral pink that is verging on neon. It promises a matte finish, and I think it lives up to that claim, but it's not an intense matte. It has a creamy look and feel that makes it easy to apply and very wearable and comfortable on the lips.

The triple butter complex of Shea Butter, Coconut Butter and Mango Butter give the balm a smooth, gliding application and a creamy feel on the lips. The creamy feel only lasts for a couple hours though, and it does become drier throughout the day.

If you have excessively dry, dehydrated lips, I wouldn't recommend this product for you. The product clung to the dry cracks in my lips. I think the moisturizing formula helped my lips from becoming drier than they already were, but it wasn't hydrating enough that the dry patches went away.

I got 6 solid hours of wear out of the balm before I wanted to reapply/remove. It faded a bit, but the color started so vibrant, you could hardly tell. The color wore off the most on the outer corners of my lips and on the inner rim of my lips. It become dry to the point that even though I could have gotten another hour or two of great color wear, I had to remove and rehydrate my lips.

name: Lynn
review: I did lots of youtubing and googling and looking up reviews before I bought these in elusive and audacious. They look better in the tube than on my face. It goes on so blotchy and I can't get that smooth color, with and without prior lip balm application.  The balm stains are nicer. When I wipe it off, I look at it and think "oh that's such a pretty color" but on my lips, it's not a smooth or consistent application. Thoroughly disappointed.

name: abbchap
review: There's a lot of product In here! I would buy it again in all of the shades! The staying power is incredible and the colors are so bright! (Some shades are more good for everyday though!) And it stays on longer than my mac lipsticks!

name: K.O.
review: Great product. Had to go buy 3 more.

name: DaraREALTOR
review: I bought this product looking for a dark plum look. I wanted something I could were as a professional REALTOR and look good on Dates with the Hubby. I will tell you it does both. I felt so confident in this shade and the Revelon name is a household name. I thought the price was well worth it.

name: Callie
review: A matte balm sounded a little weird too Me, and I really wasn't expecting so much color pay off, but it's an amazing formula that gives off amazing pigment! I already own four and I love them!

name: Fatima
review: The color is a bit lighter than expected. The color is still very pretty, and very easy to apply. I wish the color came on consistently, but overall nice. It smells minty and feels like lip balm (hense the name).

name: JB
review: I can't say enough positives about this. The color was beautiful, it was a great application, not drying at all like many matte products.

name: AZCat
review: I like the color intensity and matte look. After 3 hours there was still color on my lips, but it was very dry with a crackled appearance. The color lasts, but the balm does not.

name: celica
review: Perfectly pigmented, easy to apply and leaves my lips moisturized!

name: Evelyn
review: Easy to apply.

name: Jodi
review: I use it on my lips. No need to expand

name: Selina
review: It is perfectly pigmented! I love this lip balm and highly recommended to you!

name: Romi
review: Recommended by store associate, pleasantly surprised at the feel and texture of this lipstick. I liked the color and how well it applied on my lips.

name: soso
review: This product is amazing because you don't have to worry about the lines you just apply it fast

name: Marisol
review: I work in operating room and most of time I'm wearing a mask and I wear this lip stick and it last and doesn't even smear

name: Lindy
review: I like how easy it is to apply. A little dry, but it lasts.

name: jennwiggles
review: I love the range of colors in this product line as well as my choices between glossy or matte. The color is vibrant and doesn't fade. I also love that I can apply it like I regular lip balm with no extra steps and it looks great. I've never been a fan of regular lipstick, it dried out my lips, not so with this- even the matte! Also, a nice side bonus (not sure if the manufacturer intended this) but they all have a slightly minty flavor which is fun

name: nolen
review: amazing product

name: SER
review:
I purchased both the "Sultry" and the "Elusive" colors The Sultry is a nice cool, wine-rose color. If you are looking for a matte wine-rose with no brown or neutral tones, Sultry is nice. Elusive looks to a be lighter version of the same, but unfortunately it comes of as chalky looking instead of creamy looking.

Both have a nice minty smell. The long wearing formula is a little drying, but stays on all morning while I sipped hot tea and reapplied a clear lip balm over it several times. Needs a touch up after lunch which is to be expected.

name: Jan
review: I use on lips and cheeks and love this product.  It's nice to get two for one!

name: Kalynn
review: Goes on smooth. Feels good on my lips. Doesn't have a funky smell. Lightweight and breathable.

name: Nicole
review: I liked this; it's good for the day, but it rubs off pretty easily, especially with eating and drinking.  It isn't drying, but it also isn't particularly moisturizing either.  I got Sultry, which has a very nice neutral red/pink color, and smells nice.

name: AmandaPMKE
review: Love the color and feel of this lip crayon! It lasted the majority of the day too.

name: upturnedroots
review: I usually find matte lipcolor to be too drying, not the case with these beauties! Sultry is my everyday fave and Standout is a great red. I really want the new Fall 2015 shades: Passionate, Fiery, and Fierce, but can't find them anywhere. Restock please!

name: Corey
review: For the price, this is an amazing product. Great way to add a pop of color. Can either enhance your made-up look or create a look when you're in a rush and don't have time to apply much else.

name: linda
review: like the fact that it can line and cover your lips.

name: Nicole
review: I love this lip stain! The only con is that it bleeds a little when it is applied, much more than the regular balm stain does. This is also a little bit drying.

name: girlie
review: I like it. very pigmented and smells like minty..

name: Ana
review: Highly pigmented. I love the texture and softness it leaves on my lips!

name: wivia13th
review: Simple, easy and effective!

name: Bunni
review: Its worth the money i got 245 "Audacious". Its a nice orangey-red color. Perfect for summer nights. Matte but not super drying like others. Only down side is it doesnt last very long. Still worth it though.

name: SA
review: I bought this for the first time. I absolutely love ittt. It's exactly what I wanted. Has a great matte finish

name: De
review: put on like regular lip stick

name: Jami
review: great lip balm... i went back and purchased a few more

name: Makeup enthusiast
review: I love these matte balms and I have been searching high and low for the new shades such as fierce/fiery/enchanting . But so far no luck. Ulta please tell me when you will bring in more!

name: trailnut
review:
I have these in three colors - Sultry, Striking and Standout - and came here today to buy Striking again. It's a holy grail lippie for me. I suppose it's a coral red color but it reads as light red on me because it doesn't pull pink or orange (though it is very warm toned.). I can wear it full strength for the most flattering red lip but mostly wear it with my favorite balm for a sheer lipstick look. It brightens my face and brings out my blue-green eyes without looking too harsh against my light, warm toned skin. I use it to color-adjust lots of other lippies, too. The formula really plays well with other products. When I want to highlight the natural color of my lips, I wear Sultry. It's such a good match (but a little more pigmented) that I sometimes use it as a lipliner.

These are amazing, especially for a drugstore product. I regularly try drugstore lipsticks, balms, etc because the colors are so enticing but I find the colors almost never stay true on my lips -- they turn very pink or purple within minutes -- and most have a very uneven or patchy wear pattern or smear around or dry out my lips. Since there aren't a lot of colors that look good on me, I end up buying much pricier products to get what I need. And it's still not easy to find pricey products that don't do those things mentioned above, especially if you want to wear them less than full strength. These matte lip balms are a major exception. The texture is beautiful -- no dead or parched looking matte here -- and it goes on so easily. BTW, these have "balm" in their name but they're pretty intensely pigmented and are opaque... at least the colors I've tried.

I prefer to wear sheer lipsticks during the day and with the formula of these there's no need to hunt for sheer versions of the gorgeous colors available here. A light dab of these will give a nice matte stain look (though they don't actually stain my lips that much). These also play very well with every type of balm and lip product I've used to get sheer dewy or shiny looks. And the colors stay true when thinned out. This is tough to find, especially with reds. Most have extremely strong pink undertones that leave no trace of red behind when thinned out.

Almost forgot…I love the packaging. Not glamorous, I know, but very user friendly. The cap is secure and the color makes it easy to grab the right one out of my bag. The fat pencil that doesn't require sharpening makes application and maintenance effortless.

name: Blair Waldorf
review: This is the most amazing product I've get used. I wore it the first time to a party and two days later my lips were still red. It's nearly impossible for me to find a lip color product that actually stays on my lips because my lower lip is big and color just doesn't stay on easily without fading or collecting/chapping. This NEVER happens with Revlon's crayons. Even if that wasn't an issue for me, I would still love this. The color is so pigmented and it feels amazing on my lips. It smells minty and feels so soothing. Sometimes I put on extra just because it feels so good. I just can't recommend this enough.

name: Saph
review: It is my new go-to lip color. It applies easily and stays on for a long time without disappearing in a weird way.  The matte color is great and I look forward to purchasing other shades.

name: Rebeca
review: This matte balm was the greatest purchase I have done. It was totally worth it.

name: Taylor Victoria
review: I love these lipsticks. I have never used lipstick before, and now I want all the colors. They are worth every penny ♡

name: victoria
review: I really wanted to like this. It is just to dry for me.

name: hydrotxmex
review: Loved this product!  I'm hooked!

name: Terri
review: Love this for that "special occasion" when you want a rich pop of color!  smooth feeling, long lastiing

name: Khetto
review: I put this on lightly, sometimes with a little bit of chapstick, and the color is quick to appear. If i layer it on heavier, it gets much darker, so depending on how you apply it, it looks great with whatever look you're trying to achieve. It's moisturizing and a very pretty color. It tends to fade from the inside of my lip to outside, so I have to check it every once in awhile to make sure my lips aren't weirdly discolored. Other than that, I love it!

name: Khetto
review: This color really complements almost any skin tone. Long-lasting and sexy.

name: Mavis
review: I wanted some color in a balm but really did not like the medicinal scent and taste

name: JoJo
review: Lasts all day, goes on smooth

name: Paige
review: I love it! I just wish it lasted all day.

name: Lipstick Addict
review: This is my favorite lip product. The crayon-style allows perfect application every time. The buttery consistency is perfect for dry lips and everyday use, and the minty smell is so soothing. My go-to color is sultry, and I get so many compliments; I'm on my third tube! They are also perfect for "rest" days in-between other drying lipsticks. The best part is how matte and pigmented they are! Typically, I have found that tinted balms have messy, sheer, unappealing applications, but this product is as pigmented as any other matte lipstick. A+ rating from me, would recommend.

name: B
review: Great product

name: Mona
review: Wish it stayed on longer

name: Annie
review: Great all day lasting color without being dry like typical long lasting lipsticks

name: Kay the Budget Buyer
review: I was really excited to try this in place of a lip stain, but I was disappointed by the cakey and messy look this balm gave. The plastic was difficult to take off to open this product and overall I would not recommend this to a friend. This product goes on similar to that of an old and dried out tube of lipstick. The color is nice, but I still put on some extra product to blend it in and make it not look cakey.

name: HBattick
review: Great color, long lasting, not sticky or cakey. This will be my "everyday" go-to lipstick.

name: jazzy
review: I really like it overall for the summer. It is a true matte.

name: PC
review: I had never tried one of these before and I don't know why I ever hesitated. The color pigmentation is fantastic and it lasts on the lips forever! Even through some eating and drinking! I only got one color but I think I'm going to have to go back and get a few more. These are great!

name: aae
review: I love this color and it is an overall great product!

name: Jess
review: I am in love with the way the lipstick applies to your lips. A crayon is so easy to use plus the texture is great.

name: Karla
review: Very patchy.  It clings to every lip line and dry patch.  It smells delicious, but I can't wear it without a gloss.  No matter how hard I try it will no apply evenly.  Will not buy again...

name: Rebekah
review: This lipstick is moisturizing and lasts a long time on the lips. Beautiful color.

name: nat
review: I really liked the color and the matte effect. Good price and long lasting.

name: ceci
review: I love that it's matte! It makes the wear lasts longer

name: GLF
review: Amazing color and control in an easy to use stick. It stays where you apply it and does not bleed. Applied in the morning, it stays on through lunch. I will be buying more colors!

name: Teresa
review: Excellent

name: Bella
review:
I am in love with this product! I was looking for a good quality lipstick and a friend recommended that I try this. And let me tell you, after my first two I wanted to order this product in every color!

This balm looks like a giant retractable lip caryon, glides right on like a regular lipstick. Impressed with how long it lasts on your lips (well it is a stain) even if it rubs off there will still be color on your lips. You can wear these without lip balm underneath and it is moisturizing enough but with the lip balm it gives it a bit of a shine to it. After applying you do get a minty/fresh feeling. Colors I got are really pigmented; Elusive, which is kind of a pinkish mauve and Standout which is almost like a bright cherry red.

name: Sarah
review: doesn't last long at all. drys out my lips. however, the color is very pigmented really love the colors, they smell and taste like mint which i love. have to reapply many times during the day.

name: The Young Professional
review: I am almost in love with these. I find that some of the lipstains work better for me, but these colors are soooo pretty and pigmented. i have fair, neutral skin and so far have tried Elusive. It's like a lighter, rose pink version of my lips. I LOVE it. can't wait to try Unapologetic and Mischivious next.

name: Mary
review: I use underneath my regular lipstick as it is too bright for an older adult to wear

name: Casie
review: Love that it really is matte & easy to apply!

name: Trixie
review: Easily glides on lips with beautiful color payoff and staying power. I purchased Standout and Sultry and am happy with both.  Standout is my favorite!

name: Emily
review:
The product itself is excellent - buildable, shiny color that doesn't fade, feather or feel sticky. The slightly minty flavor is nice but not overwhelming. It is really everything I could ever want in a shiny lip balm.

The only problem with this product is the seal. It's very flimsy and can easily be opened and then resealed. It is very important to double check the item to make sure it has not been used and then resealed and put back on the shelf.

name: Panna
review: I love this color and I apply it as a base lightly then wear another lip product on top of it, which lasts all day.  Just touch up here and there, but it is definitely worth the deal.  =)

name: Marisa
review: I like it, love the color, the texture, it's moisture

name: andi
review: i have no complaints. sultry is so pretty

name: Kaylabreallen
review: This is the first matte lip product I've ever tried, and I'm so glad that I did! This lip stick gives a beautiful color payoff, and doesn't budge until you eat something. But even then most of the color stays on, almost like it's a stain! I'll be buying the rest of the colors from this line very soon!

name: Sandy
review: Looks and feels good on. This is exactly the color i needed. For a matte lipstick it is not drying.

name: DragonCrone
review: I like that this lipstick is not shiny and slippery.

name: Jules
review: So I really love this product! The pigmentation is amazing and they really do go on smooth and creamy and stay put. I have 5 colors so far. Want to collect them all. You should definitely try these! Highly recommend!!! Great job Revlon!

name: Cristina
review: I have looked for these products for a while and they were sold out everywhere I went. I finally found them and picked up 2 colors since most were already gone and I love them. They have the perfect matte texture and give a good color. It would be good to exfoliate you lips before applying this product though because it does kinda show all the little dry and chapped spots. Other than that I love this product.

name: aj_2000
review: Revlon has been hitting them out of the park lately,and these new matte and shiny balms are no exception.  Very wearable matte, didn't excenuate my dry lips or stray without a liner.

name: Sadie S.
review:
I purchased this in Striking and it is a lovely shade of red! It is so flattering and makes me feel more beautiful! This is the best lip color I've purchased EVER. Seriously, ever. It glides on beautifully and stays for so long! With regular lipstick I am always self-conscious of smearing, getting it on my face or teeth. This is not the case with this product. I would love to see them add more colors to the collection, but I am so happy with what I have!

To best use this product I would suggest exfoliating your lips and applying a lip balm 5 minutes before you apply this color.

name: NicoleD
review: I have purchased six of the matte shades. I have Elusive, which is a lighter pastel kind of pink, and the least favorite of the shades I bought. Audacious, which is a coraly orange and I will get use out of in the summer time. Unapologetic, which is a really bright and in my opinion wearable pink. Striking is a really flattering red which I think will suit a lot of people and it is the least opaque out of the ones I purchased. Standout is a really beautiful brick red color great for the fall/winter season. And lastly, shameless which is purple and I mean purple! If you pat it in instead of applying it straight to your lips it becomes a much more wearable color. The product applies completely opaque and it has a wonderfully soft texture the reflects in the balm name. The staying power is great. Revlon did an awesome job creating a product that is matte and doesn't catch on any dry patches on your lips.

name: speed racer
review: This product is great, they have different colors that you can Pick.

name: SoniaO
review: True to color, nice minty taste. Stays on all day. Very matte but not drying.

name: AnM
review: Its a goog neutral color. Seemed a bit dull on my skin tone NC 35 olive.

name: Jan
review: This works well as a moisturizing layer under longer wearing lipstick.

name: Heath
review: I got this product in Sultry. I couldn't be happier with my purchase. The color is gorgeous and very pigmented. It lasts a while but not as long as I would like. Touch ups are necessary.

name: BreePhD
review: I love these balms! They are matte, pigmented, not drying, and perfect for everyday! I've even been experimenting with these to make ombre looks and they come out AMAZING! I use the  fuscia shade with a nude pro matte lip stick by Lorac and it works amazing! These remind me of the tarter lounging only longer lasting and they don't break after 3 uses!

name: LT
review: Feels great, long lasting, but not the color for me

name: Lou
review: I use this prods when I'm not doing bold makeup.

name: Syd
review: Use randomly as I just love wearing lipstick! This is perfect for all day use as it says on pretty well and is a super pretty color! Doesn't dry out lips, smells amazing, I just love it!!

name: AlyssaH
review: I love all of these Revlon colorburst sticks! They have a variety of colors great for all seasons, even if you a the glossy or matte look.

name: Wendy
review: I got mine in the color sultry and i am tan skinned and the color looked very natural and pigmented. My lips are naturally darker (mostly toward the outer corners)  but this lip balm makes my lips look one color and i absolutely love that. Also, the texture, although matte, it is very satisfying to the lips and quite comfortable, not drying, and it smells like mint, leaving your lips feeling fresh and cool

name: Erika
review: I don't normally fall like wearing color on my lips because I never end up liking any, but this one I fell in love with. Its a perfect burst of color, but isn't overpowering. It's a nice deep rose color and goes well on olive skin.

name: Mandy89
review: The reason why I even bought this was because I saw the color "sultry" on one of my gfs and absolutely needed it in my life. So yes, the colors are great. Its very comfortable even though its matte and I swear theres some sort of tingly sensation (perhaps plumping?) when you apply it. Unfortunately theres nothing special to it....just a pigmented balm..I know drugstore prices these days are just rising but I'd only buy it on sale or with a coupon!

name: KV
review: Pretty color, great balm!! Only con was that I had to reapply 3 times during the day.

name: Ly
review: in LOVE with this product! this is exactly how I wanted

name: bjk72
review: wanted something long lasting ..... not it

name: Maura
review: I really enjoyed this product, it was very pigmented and smelled great. However, it could be a but drying and din't last as long as i would like, but I would buy it again.

name: JRO
review: This lip balm is great!  It literally lasts me months and months and I use it everyday.  Also provides a smooth finish and moisture but with a matte finish.  I absolutely love it! :)

name: esmeshopper
review: For daily wear and going out this product is definitely worth the price.

name: Alia26
review: Love the color ***sultry

name: Krissy
review: Ok, this may be a balm, but the color is amazing and long lasting. A lovely matte finish and the crayon allows precise application. I love this, and it's cheap enough that you can have 3 and not feel like you are splurging extravagantly.

name: Rachel Nicole
review: I normally combine the matte balm with my regular Chapstick... I have really dry lips and need a more balmy lip color

name: Ash
review: I'm always on the hunt for a great berry color for fall and "Sultry" hits the mark! I'm fair skinned but with dark hair and I definitely get Snow White vibes when I wear this shade. Easy to apply and long-lasting. I get tons of compliments!

name: Bruno 1
review: Lov this going back for more.

name: Debra
review: I'm always afraid that matte lipsticks will look and feel dry and flaky, but this chubby stick feels light and has a bit of slip. The Sultry shade is a perfect pinkish brown color.  I've decided to pick up the Standout (red) shade as well.  If you are looking for a light, velvety finish, definitely try this.

name: alyson
review: Great color!  I love bold colors. I had only tried nudes in this product before and was hesitant to get the bolder colors as I am very picky about my reds and purples. But both were exactly what I was looking for. The red goes on a little orange but deepens after it has been on a few seconds. I love the feel of this product and the all day wear.

name: Bre
review: This matte lip balm is wonderful! I was afraid since it is matte that it would dry my lips out but it didn't! Beautiful colors and great product!

name: Jerilyn
review: I use it when I'm going out.  Love the color, but for evening.  I love how easy you can apply it.

name: Dawn
review: Product was too drying to be considered a balm. Increased fine lines and cracked lips.

name: Angie
review: I love this color and how is feels on the lip!

name: MoxieJas
review: The color is very opaque.  Applies without streaks.  Dries to a semi matte finish without completely drying my lips.  Has a nice light minty smell.  I'm definitely going to buy more shades.

name: KC
review: I bought this in a bright red shade, and it is a solid product.  The color lasts for 4-5 hours without eating, and doesn't wear too much even with eating.  It's not moisturizing, but it's not drying either, and it has a nice subtle mint smell.  If you are looking for an affordable lip color that lasts, this is worth it.
